table.name: item_qf_remark
table.description: This table contains item qualification remarks.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: ITEM_QF_GID
columns.description: The GID for the item qualification for an item origin.

columns.name: REMARK_SEQUENCE
columns.description: The sequence number for the item qualification remark.

columns.name: REMARK_QUAL_GID
columns.description: The GID for the item qualification remark.

columns.name: REMARK_TEXT
columns.description: The remark text for the item qualification.
